Yes! We have our Facebook page. Link: https://www.facebook.com/dind.uoa.gr
Yes, we have our department's video. Link: https://youtu.be/cLI5X4xH-wo
University site: https://en.uoa.gr/ and  Department site: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/
We are a digital tech - based department. More info: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/tmima/ and for high-school students info: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/gia_mathites_lykeioy/
Announcements info: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/anakoinoseis_kai_ekdiloseis/
Info for studies: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/proptychiakes/programma_spoydon/
Currently the department do not provide master degrees. More info for Master studies: https://www.uoa.gr/spoydes/metaptychiakes_spoydes/
Info for Erasmus: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/erasmus/
Info for Curriculum: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/proptychiakes/mathimata/
Info for future career: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/epaggelmatikes_prooptikes_apofoiton/

Info for uni staff: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/prosopiko/
Info for communication: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/epikoinonia_kai_prosbasi/

patterns: Where can i find my courses
responses: To login you will need your username and password. e-class login: https://eclass.uoa.gr/

patterns: Where can i take my books
responses: Info for Books: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/ypiresies/eydoxos/ Also books are free.
Students studying in Greece in order to be accepted, need to be on the second or fourth sector and to achieve the minimum points at the final exams(Panellinies)

patterns: Where can i find my grades
responses: Login to Mystudies(site) and use your username and password: https://my-studies.uoa.gr/Secr3w/connect.aspx
Login with your academic email and password: https://webmail.noc.uoa.gr/src/login.php
Info for foreign languages: http://www.didaskaleio.uoa.gr/
Info for uni Hub: https://hub.uoa.gr/
Info for library: https://pergamos.lib.uoa.gr/uoa/dl/frontend/index.html
Info for registration: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/proptychiakes/archeia_enimerosis_protoeton/
Info for university jobs: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/syndesmoi/prokiryxeis/
Info for students with disabilities: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/ypiresies/monada_prosbasimotitas/
Info for regulations: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/tmima/kanonismoi/
General info: https://www.dind.uoa.gr/spoydes/proptychiakes/
Info for house scholarship: https://www.uoa.gr/foitites/paroches_drastiriotites/stegastiko_epidoma/
Info for library: https://www.dcarts.uoa.gr/foitites/bibliothiki/
Info for free food: https://www.dcarts.uoa.gr/foitites/sitisi_stegasi/
Greek citizens do not pay fees, academia is free. Books are also free.
